13.1 Independent Parties: You and CaseAc: 13.1 Mapato Akazvimirira: Iwe neCaseActive makambani akazvimirira. Chibvumirano hachiumba chero mubatanidzwa, mubatanidzwa, mubatanidzwa kana hukama hwebasa pakati pemapato. Iwe unofanirwa kuve wega mutoro wekutarisa vashandi vako uye kune chero uye chero muripo, mutero, mabhenefiti uye zvikwereti kune vashandi vako uye chero yevamwe vamiririri kana vevapi vevashandi. Iwe kana iwe chero wevashandi vako, vamiririri, kana vashandisi vekuita basa musaita chero humbowo, mvumo kana garandi zvine chekuremekedza isu, Chibvumirano kana maSevhisi kunze kwekungobvumidzwa zvakajeka nesu mukunyora.
13.2 Assignment: Neither the Agreement n: 13.2 Kugovera: Kunyange Chibvumirano kana chero chako kodzero kana zvisungo pasi pechibvumirano chinogona kupihwa kana kuchinjiswa, nekushanda kwemutemo kana neimwe nzira, pasina mvumo yedu yakanyorwa yekutanga, kunze kwekunge wapihwa unomutsiva mukufarira, kana nekuda kwekubatanidzwa. Kugadzirisazve, kana kutengesa kana kuchinjisa zvese kana zvakawandisa zvinhu zvako zvese zvaunotipa ziviso mazuva anosvika makumi matatu (30) isati yapera kutengeswa kwacho. Basa newe, zvichienderana nemamwe mamiriro ezvinhu, rinoda mvumo yedu yekumberi, iyo mvumo isingaitwe zvisina musoro. Tinogona kupa mahara chibvumirano ichi pasina mvumo yako. Zvichienderana nezvataurwa, Chibvumirano ichi chinosunga uye nekubatsira iwo mapato, avo vanotevedzera uye vanobvumidzwa kupihwa.
13.3 Force Majeure: Neither party will b: 13.3 Kumanikidza Majeure: Hapana bato richazoita basa nekunonoka, kukanganiswa kana kumwe kutadza kuita pasi pechibvumirano nekuda kwezviito zvinopfuura kutungamirwa kwebato rinotungamira, asi kungori kwenguva yakareba zvakadaro. Kumanikidza zviitiko zvejeje zvinosanganisira, asi hazvigumiri kune: njodzi dzinongoitika dzoga (semuenzaniso mheni, kudengenyeka, madutu, mafashama); hondo, mhirizhonga, zviitiko zvehugandanga, uye kuitirana zvehurumende; kuchinjanisa kwemunharaunda mabasa evatakuri, uye zvimwe zviitiko zvechitatu mapato; kuputika nemoto; embargoes, kurohwa uye kukakavara kwevashandi; zvirevo zvehurumende; kukundikana kwevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwefoni kana vashandisi ve internet; kukundikana kwevatengesi vebato rechitatu, vashandisi vebasa kana vatengesi; uye chero chimwe chikonzero chakakonzera kutonga kwepati zvine musoro.
13.4 Choice of Law: The Agreement and an: 13.4 Sarudzo yeMutemo: Chibvumirano uye chero kukakavara kunobva kunze kana kubatana neChibvumirano kuchange kuchidzorwa uye kuchinziwa pasi pemutemo weHurumende yeCalifornia, pasina hanya nemisimboti yekukonana kwemitemo. Nharo dzese dzinobuda kunze kana dzakanangana neChibvumirano dzinofanirwa kuve pasi pehutongi hwepasirese uye nzvimbo yedare reCalifornia nematare emubatanidzwa weSanta Barbara, California, nemapato acho vanobvumirana nekutonga kwematare edzimhosva aya.

Kunze kwekutsanangura zvakatsanangurwa apa, mishonga inopihwa pano ndeyekuwedzera, uye kwete yega, chero mimwe mishonga yemubato pamutemo kana mukuenzana.
13.7 Severability: If any provision of t: 13.7 Severability: Kana chero kupihwa kwechibvumirano ichi kuchinge kwakaitwa nedare redziviriro zvine hutongi zvinopesana nemutemo, hurongwa uhu huchashandurwa nedare ndokududzirwa kuitira kuti zvibudirire kuita zvakanaka zvinangwa zvekutanga zvakabvumidzwa mutemo, uye zvasara zvasara zveChibvumirano ichi chinoramba chiri musimba rakazara uye zvichishanda.
13.8 Entire Agreement: To the maximum ex: 13.8 Chibvumirano chakakwana: Kusvika pamwero mukuru unobvumidzwa nemutemo unoshanda, Chibvumirano ichi, pamwe chete nemagwaro akafungidzirwa pano uye maForodha ose mafomu uye kusaina-kuyerera, inoumba chibvumirano chakakwana pakati pemapato maererano nenyaya yayo yezvinhu, uye kupfuura zvese zvakapfuura uye zvibvumirano zvekufungisisa, kurudziro kana zvinomiririra, zvakanyorwa kana kumuromo, zvine chekuita nenyaya yechibvumirano ichi. Hapana chinomiririra, kutora kana kuvimbisa kuchatorwa kunofanirwa kunge kwakapihwa kana kuratidzwa kubva kuchinhu chero chakataurwa kana kunyorwa munhaurirano pakati pemapato pamberi peChibvumirano ichi kunze kwekunyatsotsanangurwa muchibvumirano ichi. Hapana bato rinofanirwa kuve nemushonga wekuremekedza chero chirevo chisiri kutaurwa nemumwe wacho icho bato ichi chakavimba mukupinda muchibvumirano ichi (kunze kwekunge chataurwa chisiri chokwadi chakaitwa nenzira yekunyepa) uye kuti mubato wega wega mubato mune chero chirevo chisiri chechokwadi kutyora chibvumirano sezvakapihwa muchibvumirano ichi. Unobvuma uye unobvuma kuti chibvumirano chako apa hachisi chekupokana nekutumidzwa kwese kwebasa remangwana kana zvinhu zvisina kutsanangurwa apa kana mune Fomu reOrda kana kuvimba nechero ripi zvaro remuromo kana rakanyorwa, ruzhinji kana rwevanhu zvakavanzika zvakaitwa nesu zvine chekuita neramangwana basa kana maitiro for the Services. Muchiitiko chekupokana kupi pakati pezviripo muizvi General Terms of Service uye chero Order Fomu kana Mamwe maFicha ebasa, zvimiro zveForodha Fomu kana Mamwe maSevenende ebasa achakunda, kusvika pakukakavara kwakadaro. Hapana mazwi kana zvirevo zvakataurwa mugwaro rako rekutenga kana mune chero ehumwe zvinyorwa zvako zvekodhi zvichabatanidzwa mukati kana kuita chero chikamu cheichi Chibvumirano, uye zvese izvi zvirevo kana mamiriro haangavi pasina.
